oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Schneider. J.S. Schneider Meat Market.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: J.S. Schneider Meat Market. Real photograph postcard (RPPC). Undated. His business was located in several locations in Knoxville, TN. In 1887 it was at 376 Broad Street with a stall at 45 Market House. In 1890 the address was 389 Broad Street. In 1901 the business was at 50 Market House and in 1907 it included 51 Market House. Ca. 1910 the business was in 7 Market House and he went into partnership with E.M. Atkinson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Meat; Markets;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
